official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim January 28, 1988 and 1989, as "Day of Marti, Apostle of Liberty".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate January 28, 1988 and 1989, as Day of Marti, Apostle of Liberty. (Jose Marti is remembered as "The Apostle of Cuban Independence.")

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim January 28, 1988 and 1989, as "Day of Marti, Apostle of Liberty".
